Translations.Text: Jastita jasta milavinyacya mohane tumhala gaphila karuna takale
Yetheparyarnta ki tumhi kabrastanata ja'una pohocale (daphana jhale)
Mulica nahi, tumhi lavakaraca januna ghyala
Mulica nahi, tumhala phara lavakara kaluna ye'ila
Mulica nahi, jara tumhi khatrisirapane januna ghyala
Tara niscitaca tumhi jahannama jarura pahala
Ani tumhi tila visvasacya dolyanni pahala
Maga tya divasi tumhala niscitapane krpa denagyambabata vicarale ja'ila
